name: Plague Overflow
description:
Plague Overflow is an Arena Top-Down game developed for the GMTK Jam 2020, the theme is OUT OF CONTROL. In this game, your creations are out of control, and the only way to delay your end is using the same potion used to create them, making them multiply.

Your Plague Doctor is out of control of it's own creations and it's own hands that throws potions without it's will.

------------------------------

Softwares used:

Engine: Unity

Coding: Visual Studio (C#)

Art: Procreate, Photoshop, illustrator

Shader: Shader Graph (Unity)

Music: Garage Band for Mac (using apple loops)

Sound Effects: Audacity

Font: Diie Font (Made by me for the game Diie, https://brunogatcar.itch.io/diie)
